oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in black ink, 9 lines per page, lightly sanded to prevent ink runs.
Multiple sections, sewn through folds on recessed cords, covers missing.
Manuscript in good condition though binding deteriorating.
MS Indic 2534. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
in various Indic languages in Khojki script.
